name: client-server-with-postgresql
description: If you would like to experiment with a PostgreSQL back-end database for your project, you can spin up the example Apollo client and server app (see `examples/apollo-tutorial-react` to make sure you have configured the examples correctly) with the `docker-compose.yml` file in this folder.
